location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:70 x 96 mmCondition:The image is in good condition.Foliation:'b'; '22'Process:Silver gelatin print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View in Linga [Lingeh] of a camel caravan. The camels walk from left to right away from the camera. At least one man walks in formation with them. In the background at left, a yakhchāl(ice pit) with an arched doorway is visible.Inscriptions:Lower left, below image, in pen: ‘Linga.’Upper left, above image, in pencil, crossed-out: ‘b’Lower right, alongside image, in pencil: ‘22’Lower right, below image, in pen: ‘(Jan. 1918)’
